ygData.subject: Re: Level and Weapon Used
ygData.msgSnippet: well, i mainly use a glowing crook..i tried the hammer, and didn t really care for it because of the delay....gonna try to get me a staff of the observer
ygData.messageBody:
well, i mainly use a glowing crook..i tried the hammer, and didn't really care for it because of the delay....gonna try to get me a staff of the observer somtime...if i can ever drag myself away from cazic (;

(\/)ystik
lv 36 <as of now> human cleric

Olli Haapam∩┐╜ki wrote:

> From: Olli Haapam∩┐╜ki <olli.haapamaki@...>
>
> -- From: "Kris Becan" <phonic@...>
> >i'm just wondering what everyone is using for a weapon at what levels? I am a 21 level cleric >mostly using a fine steel morning star, with the hammer of wraith for the magical creature. What >about everyone else?
>
> I currently have both Bloodforge hammer and Glowing wooden crook. Have the same ATK
> with both weapons so i prefer Bloodforge hammer nowadays since it provides light and
> +10 resist against magic. The crook has better dly rate so i use that whenever i fight solo.
>
> Iyenya Goldenheart
> Lvl 22 dwarf cleric
> Innoruuk server
